def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import FieldDefinition from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import Entity from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityDefinition
registro = widget.Entity
botaoSPEDVisible = registro.BotaoSPEDVisible() if (not botaoSPEDVisible): widget.View.Commands["GRP_SPED"].Visible = False
botaoObservacoesLancFiscaisVisible = registro.BotaoObservacaoLancamentosFiscaisVisible() if (not botaoObservacoesLancFiscaisVisible): widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Items["OBSERVACAOLANCFISCAIS"].Visible = False
# botaoAquisicaoSafraVisible = registro.BotaoAquisicaoSafraVisible() # if (not botaoAquisicaoSafraVisible): # widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Items["AQUISICAOSAFRA"].Visible = False
widget.View.Commands["GRP_FUNCOES"].Items["CMD_SUSPENSAO"].Visible = registro.BotaoSuspenderVisivel()
widget.View.Commands["GRP_FUNCOES"].Items["CMD_LIBERACAO"].Visible = registro.BotaoLiberarVisivel()
widget.View.Commands["GRP_COMANDOS"].Items["CMD_COMISSOES"].Visible = registro.ControlaComissao(registro.Fields["HANDLE"].Value);
widget.View.Commands["CMD_SELECIONARCONTA"].Visible = widget.View.Commands["CMD_CONFIRMARDOCUMENTO"].Visible;

def OnCMD_SUSPENSAOExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNDocumento
documento = FNDocumento.Get(entity.Fields["HANDLE"]) tipoDocumento = ""
if documento.EhEntrada(): tipoDocumento = "CPA" else: tipoDocumento = "CRE"
command.OutputDefinition.Url += "?tipo=" + tipoDocumento

def OnCMD_LIBERACAOExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNDocumento
documento = FNDocumento.Get(entity.Fields["HANDLE"]) tipoDocumento = ""
if documento.EhEntrada(): tipoDocumento = "CPA" else: tipoDocumento = "CRE"
command.OutputDefinition.Url += "?tipo=" + tipoDocumento

def OnCMD_LANCAMENTOSFINANCEIROSExecute(command, entity): import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes") from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Financeiro import FNLancamentoCodigoInterno documento = entity
if(documento.EhCPA() or documento.EhAdtoFornecedor() or documento.DevolucaoFornecedor() or documento.EhFiscalEntrada()): command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciBCP elif(documento.EhCRE() or documento.EhAdtoCliente() or documento.DevolucaoCliente() or documento.EhFiscalSaida()): command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["CODIGOINTERNO"] = FNLancamentoCodigoInterno.ciBCR
command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["ENTIDADEORIGEM"] = documento command.OutputDefinition.Parameters["SOMENTELEITURA"] = False
